name: places/ChIJS-PqK3dZwokRSyWRbHtdYSE
formattedAddress: 335 E Houston St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 335 E Houston St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text: Chef Rossi and her incredible crew did an INCREDIBLE job with our wedding two years ago. My wife and I look back so fondly on our special day and, without fail, we go on and on about the food. Pastrami tacos? Sweet potato latkes? Crab cakes? The most delicious chicken you’ve ever had? Chocolate dipped bacon?? Just an incredible meal. Friends still rave to me about their favorite bites when I see them! I just sent Rossi a second anniversary thank you message; we can’t imagine our day without her. You’ll forever be glad that you hired The Raging Skillet!

originalText.text: I cannot express enough how thankful I am for Chef Rossi, Charmaine, and the rest of The Raging Skillet team! From the beginning, Chef Rossi was warm and welcoming and immediately shared my excitement about the wedding. What I love most about TRS is that everything is customizable and Chef Rossi wants to make sure her food reflects the wedding vision. She paid attention to every little detail I asked for. Creating a menu and signing an agreement with her was such a breeze! Closer to the wedding, her administrative team was totally on top of every change and request I made. I felt at ease going through a walk through, setting up the timeline, and making sure all bases were covered. They have years of experience and that was certainly demonstrated from beginning to end. On top of all that, her food is some of the best food I have ever tasted in my life. It is not typical wedding food and we received hundreds of compliments throughout the reception. Every item on the menu reflected who my husband and I are as people. Chef Rossi is an extremely unique caterer and we absolutely loved every second working with her! Thank you thank you thank you! The TRS helped us create memories that will last a lifetime!

originalText.text:
I've worked for Raging Skillet for many years and I am always impressed by how generous Chef Rossi is to the staff. She always makes sure we have a staff meal before the event begins. She takes great care to make sure there are Gluten Free options for those of us who need it as well as Vegetarian and Vegan options.
During the height of the pandemic in New York City, when all work dried up and we didn't know when relief would come, she was going to her kitchen every week and making soups, stews and gorgeous vegetable dishes and delivering them to her staff and anyone she knew who needed it.
Chef Rossi's heart is in the right place. Her personal mission statement is; "Spread Love". She does that each and every day. Thank you, Chef Rossi.

originalText.text: Chef Rossi is the best of the best! Her food is fun, creative and absolutely delicious! She takes the time to listen to your vision of your event and executes it perfectly! Everything she made was perfect! I cannot give her and her team enough praise!

text.text: Chef Rossi is the best of the best! Her food is fun, creative and absolutely delicious! She takes the time to listen to your vision of your event and executes it perfectly! Everything she made was perfect! I cannot give her and her team enough praise!

originalText.text: We LOVED The Raging Skillet. Chef Rossi and Charmaine are incredibly kind, funny, and creative. They put together a Floating Supper and Grazing Table for our 145 guests that kept everyone full and excited. Our guests loved our cocktail hour's bacon and peanut butter sandwiches, bbq pork on a ritz, sweet potato latkes, to name a few. They even created toasted ravioli as a tribute to my husband's St. Louis hometown. The passed entrees (pasta, fish and meat) were all so tasty and able to be eaten standing or sitting. And the small desserts were perfect! S'mores pops, key lime pies, etc.! Charmaine checked in on us throughout the evening - made sure we and our families were fed! She even put together a cracker plate for our niece and nephew before the ceremony. Chef came by for a hug on the dance floor. Seriously the coolest and most fun/elegant food. We couldn't have been happier! Thank you!
